goal.ch: 了解地質記錄中的地表與岩石圈演化歷史、以及所使用的科學工具與概念
goal.en: Understanding evolution of Earth‘s surface and lithosphere, and the associated scientific methodologies and concepts

outline.ch: 認識研究地球演化的方法論(地質定年、板塊運動與造山、環境變遷、生物演化與絕滅)，以及地球歷史重要事件簡介
outline.en: Introducing the concepts and methodologies in studying evolution of the Earth (including geochronology, orogeny and plate tectonics, environmental changes, evolution and extinctions), and briefings on important events in Earth‘s history

textbook.ch:
Ronald E. Martin, 2018, Earth‘s Evolving Systems: The History of Planet Earth, Jones ＆ Bartlett Learning.
Assigned/reference papers
textbook.en:
Ronald E. Martin, 2018, Earth‘s Evolving Systems: The History of Planet Earth, Jones ＆ Bartlett Learning.
